How do applicants register with PRODA? f.answer: This program demonstrates how to create and use a PRODA account to securely access certain online services including Health Professional Online Services, also known as H POS, and the National Disability Insurance Scheme, also known as the N D I S.

How do I register for Proda?.answer: This program demonstrates how to create and use a PRODA account to securely access certain online services including Health Professional Online Services, also known as H POS, and the National Disability Insurance Scheme, also known as the N D I S.
